title: Frame Rate Issues in 6.17
body: Terrible frame rate since 6.17 came out. Its happening to several friends and other players in game.

replies.body: duno I have splat right before load screen into match. i dont think they got all the bugs. i have no logitec or game bar installed, latest gfx update, have done the "repair". even deleted and reinstalled. still crashing and riot stopped sending me help after the copy paste reply that sends you to the process of a lot of the stuff I listed +.

There have been a number of players reporting low FPS after the recent Windows 10 Anniversary update. Those updates may have installed very recently for you, so I recommend [disabling the Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), since a lot of players report that fixes the issue. If that doesn't work for you, our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) consolidates a lot of the common solutions for FPS issues, and is a great starting point in resolving this issue.

Let me know if this helped you.
Riot fix a lot of bugs in this patch, more then others.
